meaningMnemonic: At least way back in the day, things that <kanji>teach</kanji> <kanji>instructions</kanji> to people are things that teach a <vocabulary>lesson</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>moral</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>teachings</vocabulary>. Back in the day, lots of learning was done through storytelling, and storytelling taught lessons and morals, thus, this word.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
